      • HasEngine

        public HasEngine(int id,
                 Color c,
                 int numberWheel,
                 Location l,
                 int km,
                 boolean lights,
                 Engine engine,
                 int countFuel,
                 int limitAge)
        the constructor of class HasEngine
        Parameters:
        id - - the vehicle id , the id have to be 1,000 - 1,000,000
        c - - the 'enum' Color
        numberWheel - - number of wheel
        l - - the instance of Location class
        km - - the KM of the vehicle
        lights - - boolean, true if the lights is on and else false
        engine - - instance of class Engine
        countFuel - - count of fuel noew of this vehicle
        limitAge - - limit of age for drive in this vehicle

        c - the color of this vehicle
        engine - instance from class Engine, this is the engine of this car
